name: Leaf Pile Simulator
description:
Just in time for Autumn 2021... or really late for Autumn 2020. 

This was a very small project I recently returned to after hitting walls with my other ongoing projects. Just a little fun thing where you can fling leaves around a see what happens. :) 

NOTE: If you're using Chrome and using the arrow keys to play I'd recommend enabling "Navigate pages with a text cursor" (Settings > Advanced > Accessibility) to stop the page scrolling during gameplay.  

There's quite a few audio sync issues in Firefox so it's best to use a different browser if possible. 

CONTROLS: Use the right and left arrow keys or A and D to move

Use the up arrow or  W to jump (can also use with left/right or A/D keys).

Press the down arrow key or S to fling leaves around!

Press Space or Ctrl to sweep up and start again...
